cases.stdout:
Usage: kode [options] [command] [prompt]

Common options:
  -h, --help           Show full help
  -v, --version        Show version
  -p, --print          Print response and exit (non-interactive)
  -c, --cwd <cwd>      Set working directory

cases.description: Bootstrap fallback when dist/native binary is unavailable
cases.stderr:
❌ Kode is not runnable on this system.

Tried:
- Native binary (postinstall download)
- Node.js runtime fallback

Fix:
- Reinstall (ensure network access), or set KODE_BINARY_BASE_URL to a mirror
- Or download a standalone binary from GitHub Releases

cases.description: ACP bootstrap fallback when dist/native binary is unavailable
cases.stderr:
❌ kode-acp is not runnable on this system.
Tried:
- Native binary (postinstall download)
- Node.js runtime fallback
Fix:
- Reinstall (ensure network access), or set KODE_BINARY_BASE_URL to a mirror
- Or download a standalone binary from GitHub Releases
Package version: 2.0.2
